resources.string: I-TalkBack isifundi sesikrini kakhulukazi sabantu abanokungaboni kanye nokubona okuncane. Ivumela ukuhlanganyela nedivayisi kusetshenziswa impendulo ekhulunywayo.

Uma kunikwe amandla, i-Explore by touch ikuvumela ukuthi uzwe okungaphansi komunwe wakho. Hambisa umunwe wakho ezintweni maphakathi nesikrini sakho. Ngemuva kokuthi uhlole izinto ezinhlanu, isifundo sizoqhubeka.
Ingxenye engu-2: Thepha kabili ukuze wenze kusebenze
Ukuze wenze kusebenze into yokugcina oyizwile, thepha kabili noma kukuphi. Thola into engu-4 uphinde uyenze isebenze manje. Ngemuva kwalokho, yenza kusebenze Okulandelayo ukuze uqhubeke.
Into engu-4 yenziwe yasebenza. Thola uphinde wenze kusebenze inkinobho Okulandelayo ukuze uqhubeke

Izifundo ze-TalkBack zihlelwe ngokufanayo. Indawo engaphezulu inesifundo, ongasihlola uphinde usifunde noma kunini. Futhi inenkinobho yekhaya lokokufundisa kukhona eliphezulu ngakwesokunxele. Okumaphakathi kunendawo yokuzilolonga. Inkinobho inesibonisi sokuqhubeka kanye nezinkinobho zokuzulazula kwesifundo. yenza kusebenze okulandelayo manje ukuze uqhubeke.

Futhi ungahlola ngokuswayipha isikrini ngomunwe wakho. Ukuswayiphela ngakwesokunxele kuvame ukuhlola phezulu nangakwesokunxele, kuthi ukuswayiphela ngakwesokudla kuhlola phansi nangakwesokudla. Kuzame manje.
Ukuze uzwe ukuthi yini engaphansi komunwe wakho, wuhambise kusikrini. Thepha kabili noma yikuphi ukuze wenze kusebenze ekutheni yini oyizwayo. Swayiphela ngakwesokunxele noma kwesokudla ukuze uhlole.

Ungaskrolela phambili noma emuva kuhlu usebenzisa isinqamuleli. Ukuze uskrolele phambili, hambisa umunwe wakho owodwa ngakwesokudla bese ngakwesokunxele ngokunyakaza okukodwa. Ukuze uskrolele emuva, hambisa umunwe wakho owodwa ngakwesokunxele. Kuzame manje.

Skrolela phambili ngokuhambisa umunwe owodwa ngakwesokunxele. Skrolela emuva ngokuhambisa umunwe owodwa kusuka ngakwesokudla kuya kwesokunxele. Skrolela emuva ngokuhambisa umunwe owodwa kusuka kwesokunxele kuya kwesokudla.
Imenyu ye-Global TalkBack, imenyu ye-TalkBack yendawo

I-TalkBack inamamenu amabili ahlukile. Youqala, imenu ye-Global TalkBack, njalo iqukethe imiyalo efanayo. Ungayisebenzisa ngokuhambisa umunwe owodwa phansi bese ngakwesokudla ngokunyakaza okukodwa, bese uphakamise umunwe wakho. Sebenzisa inguqulo yokuzilolonga manje.
Izinketho zemenyu zifakwa kuhlu ngokwehlayo ngaphakathi kwesikrini. Zama ukuhlola. Uma uqedile, yenza kusebenze ukukhansela.

Imenyu yesibili kuyimenyu ye-Local TalkBack. Izinto kule menyu zehlukile kuye ngokuthi uzwe ini kokugcina. Ungasebenzisa le menyu ngokuhambisa umunwe wakho owodwa uphezulu bese ngakwesokudla ngokunyakaza okukodwa, bese uphakamise umunwe wakho. Sebenzisa imenyu yokuzilolonga manje.
Hambisa umunwe wakho phansi bese ngakwesokudla ukuze usebenzise imenyu ye-Global TalkBack. Hambisa umunwe wakho phezulu bese kwesokudla ukuze wenze kusebenze imenyu ye-TalkBack yendawo.
Imenyu ye-Global TalkBack: Phansi bese kwesokudla. Imenyu ye-TalkBack yendawo: Phezulu bese kwesokudla

I-TalkBack ikuvumela ukuthi ulawule ukuthi umbhalo ufundelwa wona ngepharagrafu, umugqa, igama, noma uhlamvu ngesikhathi. Ukufunda ngohlamvu kungasiza ngesipelingi. Setha ukulinganisela kokuzulazula kombhalo kube yizinhlamvu ngokuthepha umbhalo ongezansi, bese uswayiphela phansi naphezulu.
Hlola izinketho zesilinganiselo sokufunda ezifakwe ngokwehlayo kuhlu lapha. Thola uphinde wenze kusebenze inketho yokufunda ngohlamvu.
Manje ufunda ngohlamvu. Khetha umbhalo wesampuli, bese uswayiphela kwesokudla ukuze ufunde ngohlamvu.
Shintsha isilinganiso sokuzulazula kombhalo ngokuswayipha uye phansi naphezulu. Funda uhlamvu olulandelayo kumbhalo wesampuli ngokuswayiphela kwesokudla.

Nawu omunye umbhalo wesampuli wokuzilolonga kwe-TalkBack. \"Ikuphi i-Kansas?\" kubuze indoda, ngokumangala. \"Angazi,\" kuphendule u-Dorothy ngokukhathazeka, \"kodwa ikhaya lami, futhi ngiyazi ukuthi lisendaweni ethile.\"\n\n\"Kungenzeka kakhulu. Empeleni, i-Oz ingenza noma yini; ngakho-ke kungenzeka akutholele i-Kansas. Kodwa okokuqala kuzomele umbone, futhi lokho kuzoba wumsebenzi onzima; ngoba i-Great Wizard ayithandi ukubona umuntu, futhi ngokuvamile inendlela yayo. Kodwa Ufuna ini?\" waqhubeka, ekhuluma no-Toto.
Ukwenza kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlela, ukuthayipha, ukuhambisa isikhombisi, ukukhetha nokusebenza kumbhalo

Nge-TalkBack, ungasebenzisa ibhokisi lokuhlela ukuze uthayiphe, ukhethe, futhi uhlele umbhalo. Ukuze wenze kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlela, lithephe kabili. Ngemuva kokuthi wenze kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlela, ikhibhodi itholakala ngaphansi kwesikrini. Ungacashisa ikhibhodi ngokuthepha kunkinobho yokubuyela emuva. Zama ukwenza kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlela manje. Uma uqedile, yenza kusebenze okulandelayo, manje okungaphezulu kwekhibhodi.

Ukuze uthayiphe, wenze kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlela futhi uhambise umunwe wakho kukhibhodi ekusikrini. Uma uzwa uhlamvu olufunayo, phakamisa umunwe wakho ukuze ulwenze lusebenze. Zama ukwenza kusebenze uphinde uthayiphe kubhokisi lokuhlela ngezansi.

Ungahambisa umcibisholo usebenzisa inkinobho yevolumu kudivayisi yakho noma ngemenyu yasendaweni ye-TalkBack. Ngenketho yesilawuli somcibisholo kule menyu, ungaphinda ukhethe, usike, ukopishe, noma unamathisele umbhalo. Yenza kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlela ngezansi, uphinde uhambise umcibisholo kumbhalo wesampuli.

Yenza kusebenze ibhokisi lokuhlola ngokuthepha kabili. Thayipha ngokuhambisa umunwe wakho ngaphezulu kohlamvu, bese uphakamisa umunwe wakho. Hambisa isikhombisi ngezinkinobho zevolumu kanye nemenyu yasendaweni ye-TalkBack. Khetha uphinde usebenze kumbhalo usebenzisa inketho yesilawuli somcibisholo kumenyu yasendaweni ye-TalkBack.
I-%1$s yenziwe yasebenza kumodi yokuzilolonga. Yenza kusebenze inkinobho YOKUKHANSELA ukuze uphume.
Lesi sifundo sidinga i-Explore by touch. Sicela unike amandla i-Explore by touch ngaphambi kokuqalisa isifundo.
Lesi sifundo sidinga i-TalkBack ukuthi inikwe amandla. Sicela uvule i-TalkBack ngaphambi okuqalisa isifundo.
Isifundo se-TalkBack asitholakali ngenkathi impendulo imiswe okwesikhashana. Sicela uqalise kabusha impendulo ye-TalkBack futhi uqalise phansi okokufundisa ukuze kuqhubeke.
